creator: ragaller@apache.org
text:
Ok - now this is a bit of a weird one and I'm not shure is ever a user is confronted with
it

1) go to site tab
2) copy a document
3) paste to itself (the result is correct: a
child with the same name)
4) do that again with the same document (doubbling of documents
occurs)

copy paste procedures are convenient to rapidly produce documents containing
the same content to test the pagination on the search results screen (this is how i discovered
the bug).

creator: ragaller@apache.org
text: Looking at this again, i found out that it's working as expected - sorry for the noise.
